/home/kien/project/fpga_network/SimGrid-3.21/smpi_script/bin/smpif90    -g CMakeFiles/sef90.dir/sef90.f90.o  -o sef90 -Wl,-rpath,/home/kien/project/fpga_network/SimGrid-3.21/lib ../../../../lib/libsimgrid.so.3.21 -lm /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_context.so -lpthread -lrt /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libdl.so -lgfortran   -Wl,--as-needed -latomic -Wl,--no-as-needed
